# ciscoise_guest_user_approve (Data Source)

It performs update operation on GuestUser.

- This data source action allows the client to approve a guest user by ID.

## Example Usage

```terraform
data "ciscoise_guest_user_approve" "example" {
  provider = ciscoise
  id       = "string"
}
```
